hint: Push filters on date, item, and catalog_sales early, and use explicit joins to control join order and reduce row counts.
Pre-filter dimension tables (date_dim, item) and fact table (catalog_sales) into CTEs, then join with explicit JOIN syntax to minimize intermediate data.
Materialize pre-filtered dimension and fact tables in CTEs, and restructure the query to avoid duplicate scans of the fact table.
Apply structural transformations such as decomposing the outer join and using early filter decorrelation to enable novel access paths and reduce computation.
